title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. VI, pt. 622 - Uniform Enforcement Hearing Procedures

Statutory Authority: Environmental Conservation Law sections
3-0301, 15-0901, 17-0303, 19-0301, 23-0305, 33-0303, 70-0107, 71-0301, 71-1709
and 71-1719, and State Administrative Procedure Act, Article
3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
